messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

Hello r@golang.org (cc: gobot@golang.org, golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=671c5b05dc40 ***

doc: document go1.0.3
